description:
Positioned in the heart of Kings Beach, providing a sense of space, privacy and security, this impressive residence offers an easy lifestyle with quality finishes throughout and a focus on low care living and entertaining.

Immaculately presented, this east facing apartment embodies convenience and comfort on all levels and is situated within an easy walk to the patrolled beach. Offering a generously proportioned floorplan, two bedrooms and a seamless layout together with a sizeable balcony.

The spacious balcony flows directly from the dining, kitchen and lounge room taking full advantage of the natural sunlight and space while capturing delightful sea breezes. It truly embodies convenience and comfort on all levels.

– Expansive streamlined layout with spit system air con
– Spacious kitchen with Caesarstone bench tops
– Generous master bedroom with ensuite and built-ins
– Designed with effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining
– Secure car space and easy access to public transport
– Perfect holiday home, private residence or investment
– Short stroll to local cafes, restaurants, shops and patrolled beaches
– 15 minutes to Sunshine Coast University Medical Precinct
– 25 minutes to Sunshine Coast Airport

Enhanced by its sought-after beachside location, within easy strolling distance to the patrolled beach, boutique cafes and restaurants, Mets on Kings and other various amenities.

This is your opportunity to secure a prime beachside residence in one of the hottest positions on the Sunshine Coast.

An excellent addition to any investor portfolio, perfect for downsizing or retirees looking for a sea change.

38 on Kings is perfectly positioned on the southern end of the Sunshine Coast. Only 15 minutes to Sunshine Coast Hospital precinct and 25 minutes to Sunshine Coast Airport with famous beaches, shops, restaurants, prestigious private and state schools and Caloundra Golf Club all within a 5km radius
